titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty with respect to Flufenacet (FOE hydroxy).
A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty with respect to Flufenacet (FOE hydroxy).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend through December 31, 2009, the suspension of the duty on Flufenacet (FOE hydroxy).
